labs.title: LangChain Practical Labs
labs.description: LangChain is a framework for building LLM applications. It provides a way to connect LLMs to other tools and data sources.

labs.title: Ethical Considerations in Synthetic Data Generation
labs.description: Addressing privacy, bias, and fairness concerns in the creation and use of synthetic datasets for AI training.

labs.title: LLM Evaluation Framework
labs.description: Open source methodology for evaluating large language models across multiple dimensions.

labs.title: Reinforcement Learning Lab
labs.description: Developing intelligent agents that learn optimal decision-making strategies through interaction with their environment.

labs.title: ML 101: A Gentle Introduction
labs.description: Fundamental concepts of machine learning with an accompanying interactive Jupyter notebook for hands-on learning.
